Earnings Call Insights: Tivic Health Systems Inc. (TIVC) Q1 2025

Management View

  • CEO Jennifer Ernst stated that "we have catalyzed an aggressive reinvention of Tivic" and described a transformation from a single product, direct-to-consumer company to "a diversified immunotherapeutics company" with a clinical pipeline targeting
